documentation.text:
@notice Add a token to the allowed tokens list
 @param _token token address to add to the list

@notice Allow user to claim his rewards
 @dev emit an event YieldRewarded when rewards have been claimed

@notice Get Cube token address
 @return cubeTokenAddress Cube token address

@notice Get the rate
 @return rate rate

@notice Get the list of stakers
 @return stakers address list of stakers

@notice Get the list of allowed tokens
 @return allowedTokens address list of allowed tokens

natspec.author: jrchain
natspec.details: The constructor takes the address of the CubeToken ERC20 and a rate. The rate is used in the algorithm to calculate the rewards that should be distributed to the user. The rate represents the time in seconds to be rewarded by 100% of the amount staked. For example if the rate is 86400 seconds (1 day) and the amount staked is 1 ether, then the reward will be 1 ether (in CubeToken) after 1 day of staking. Ownership of the CubeToken contract should be transferred to the CubeFarm contract after deployment. This contract also implements the Chainlink price feed.

addAllowedToken(address).notice: Add a token to the allowed tokens list

params._token: token address to add to the list

claimYieldRewards().details: emit an event YieldRewarded when rewards have been claimed
claimYieldRewards().notice: Allow user to claim his rewards

params._rate: rate in seconds for calculating the rewards

getAllowedTokens().notice: Get the list of allowed tokens

returns._0: allowedTokens address list of allowed tokens

getNumberOfTokenStaked(address).notice: Get the number of different tokens a user stake

getPriceFeedContract(address).notice: Get the price feed address of a specific token

getTotalPendingRewards(address).notice: Get the total of pending rewards of a specific user

getUserCubeBalance(address).notice: Get Cube balance of a specific user

getUserTokenBalance(address,address).notice: Get the balance of a specific token staked by a user

getUserTokenStartTime(address,address).notice: Get the start time of last staking by a user on a specific token

returns._0: startTime start time from last staking

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setPriceFeedContract(address,address).notice: Set the price feed for a specific token

stakeTokens(uint256,address).details: emit an event TokenStaked when token is staked

params._token: address of the token to stake

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unstakeTokens(uint256,address).details: emit an event TokenUnstaked when token is unstaked

params._token: address of the token to unstake

natspec.notice: This contract creates a simple yield farming defi that rewards users for staking up their differents token with a new ERC20 token CubeToken.
natspec.title: CubeFarm
